resources.string: If you withdraw your consent to the personal information processing rules in the 《Privacy Policy》, we will not be able to provide you with services and will stop collecting and processing your personal information. \10Withdrawing consent may result in a loss of certain rights and benefits such as the ability to unbind previously bound smart devices, i.e., Glasses, and clear your exclusive configuration and address information in the navigation service. Withdrawal of consent is irreversible and should be considered carefully. Your decision to withdraw your consent will not affect the processing of personal information that has been carried out based on prior authorization. Such personal information will be anonymized or deleted after the statutory storage or retention period expressly stated in the Privacy Policy expires. For more details, please refer to the section in the 《Privacy Policy》 about personal information rights. \10To continue using this app, you will need to agree to the privacy policy again.

Dùng cho trợ lý giọng nói của kính để xem và quản lý thông tin lịch trình. Trong ứng dụng điện thoại, các tính năng trợ lý cuộc họp, dịch thuật và phiên âm giọng nói có thể thiết lập lịch trình dựa trên các mục công việc cần làm.
Dùng để chuyển cuộc gọi điện thoại sang kính, hiển thị thông tin liên hệ trên kính, và chọn liên hệ từ danh bạ điện thoại khi sử dụng trợ lý giọng nói của kính để gọi điện.

Withdraw consent to MYVU AR basic functions

If you withdraw your consent to the personal information processing rules in the 《Privacy Policy》 for the voice assistant function, we will not be able to provide you with the voice assistant service and will stop collecting and processing your personal information. Withdrawing your consent may result in a loss of certain rights and benefits. Withdrawal of consent is irreversible and should be considered carefully. Your decision to withdraw your consent will not affect the processing of personal information that has been carried out on the basis of prior authorization. Such personal information will be anonymized or deleted after the statutory storage period or the retention period expressly stated in the 《Privacy Policy》 expires. For more details, please refer to the section in the 《Privacy Policy》 about personal information rights. If you want to use this application again, you will need to agree to the personal information processing rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for the voice assistant.

If you withdraw your consent to the personal information processing rules in the 《Privacy Policy》 for the navigation, we will not be able to provide you with the navigation service and will stop collecting and processing your personal information. Withdrawing your consent may result in a loss of certain rights and benefits. Withdrawal of consent is irreversible and should be considered carefully. Your decision to withdraw your consent will not affect the processing of personal information that has been carried out on the basis of prior authorization. Such personal information will be anonymized or deleted after the statutory storage period or the retention period expressly stated in the 《Privacy Policy》 expires. For more details, please refer to the section in the 《Privacy Policy》 about personal information rights. If you want to use this application again, you will need to agree again to the personal information processing rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for the navigation.

If you withdraw your consent to the personal information processing rules in the 《Privacy Policy》 for the prompter, we will not be able to provide you with the prompter service and will stop collecting and processing your personal information. Withdrawing your consent may result in a loss of certain rights and benefits. Withdrawal of consent is irreversible and should be considered carefully. Your decision to withdraw your consent will not affect the processing of personal information that has been carried out on the basis of prior authorization. Such personal information will be anonymized or deleted after the statutory storage period or the retention period expressly stated in the 《Privacy Policy》 expires. For more details, please refer to the section in the 《Privacy Policy》 about personal information rights. If you want to use this application again, you will need to agree again to the personal information processing rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for the prompter.

If you withdraw your consent to the personal information processing rules in the 《Privacy Policy》 for the translator, we will not be able to provide you with the translation service and will stop collecting and processing your personal information. Withdrawing your consent may result in a loss of certain rights and benefits. Withdrawal of consent is irreversible and should be considered carefully. Your decision to withdraw your consent will not affect the processing of personal information that has been carried out on the basis of prior authorization. Such personal information will be anonymized or deleted after the statutory storage period or the retention period expressly stated in the 《Privacy Policy》 expires. For more details, please refer to the section in the 《Privacy Policy》 about personal information rights. If you want to use this application again, you will need to agree again to the personal information processing rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for the translator.

If you withdraw your consent to use the MYVU AR basic functions, we will not be able to provide you with the basic services for connecting smart wearable devices, smart reminders, phone calls, and weather information, and we will stop collecting and processing your personal information. Withdrawing your consent may result in a loss of certain rights and benefits, such as the ability to unbind previously bound smart devices, i.e., Glasses, and clear your exclusive configuration. Withdrawal of consent is irreversible and should be considered carefully. Your decision to withdraw your consent will not affect the processing of personal information that has been carried out on the basis of prior authorization. Such personal information will be anonymized or deleted after the statutory storage period or the retention period expressly stated in the Privacy Policy expires. For more details, please refer to the section in the 《Privacy Policy》 about personal information rights. If you want to use this application again, you need to reconfirm the personal information processing rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for the above basic functions.

Before using the voice assistant, you need to read and agree to the rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for processing personal information related to the voice assistant carefully. When you use this function, we will collect and use your recording data, voice transcription information, custom device identifier, contact information, address information, SIM card phone number (Android 14 and above only), city and location information, and Flyme account information. This information allows us to provide voice interaction services, including making or hanging up phone calls through the voice assistant and displaying navigation information and local weather information on your glasses based on voice commands. When you use the voice assistant, your conversation records will be bound to the Flyme account you have logged in with to synchronize your conversation records and provide a more consistent experience. For more details, please refer to the relevant sections of the 《Privacy Policy》. You can also use generative AI services from third-party large language model service providers through the voice assistant. We will share the text information generated from your input text or voice transcription with third-party service providers. Before using these third-party services, please ensure you have read and agreed to the third party\'s user agreement and privacy policy.

To use the navigation, you need to read and agree to the rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for processing personal information related to the navigation carefully. When you use this function, we will collect and use your voluntarily provided common address information, location information, navigation route planning, departure and destination, city, province, country region, and coordinate system information to provide positioning and navigation functions. For more details, please refer to the relevant sections of the 《Privacy Policy》.

Welcome to MYVU AR\10\10 MYVU AR is used to provide basic functions for binding, smart reminders, phone calls, viewing weather and step count information, and additional voice assistant, navigation, translation, and prompter functions among others for smart wearable glasses and other devices. Before using our products and services, please carefully read and agree to our MYVU AR 《Service Agreement》 and be sure you have understood the rules in the 《Privacy Policy》 for processing personal information related to the above basic functions. When you use the additional functions, we will provide a separate pop-up explaining how your personal information will be processed for those functions and obtain your consent separately.

To use the prompter, you need to read and agree to the rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for processing personal information related to the prompter carefully. When you use this function, we will collect and process your prompter document information and configuration information (including prompter mode settings and notification switch status) to provide prompter document import services and display the prompter content on your glasses. For more details, please refer to the relevant sections of the 《Privacy Policy》.

To use the translator, you need to read and agree to the rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for processing personal information related to the translator carefully. When you use this function, we will collect and use your recording data, voice transcription information, translation records, and configuration data (including subtitle font size) provided through the glasses microphone to provide you with translation record query, voice transcription information query, and translation record sharing services. For more details, please refer to the relevant sections of the 《Privacy Policy》.

This application requires the following necessary permissions:

Welcome to MYVU! MYVU App is used together with smart wearable devices such as matching Glasses, to provide functions such as binding smart wearable devices, short videos, navigation, AI assistant, and translation. To ensure the use of our products and services, please read and agree to the 《Privacy Policy》 and 《Service Agreement》 of our MYVU App. This agreement introduces how we will collect, use, store, and share your personal information, and describes your basic rights.\10\10 Regarding the important contents of the above privacy policy, we would like to inform you as follows:\10\10 (1) The basic function of MYVU App is to cooperate with smart wearable devices such as the Glasses. Therefore, positioning permissions, Bluetooth permissions, and notification permissions are required, to discover devices and maintain the connection status between devices;\10\10 (2) MYVU App and the matching Glasses provide a variety of functions such as AI assistant. You can choose whether to enable them. We will inform you of the purpose of the application when applying for the permissions involved in the functions. You can also disable the permissions in permission management of MYVU App at any time;\10\10 (3) To know what we collect and share, you can view 《List of Personal Information》 Collected and 《Third Party Information Sharing List》 in MYVU App at any time;\10\10 (4) We will use industry-leading security measures to protect your information security;\10\10 (5) You can view, modify, and delete personal information, withdraw consent, and cancel your account in MYVU App.

Welcome to MYVU AR\10\10 MYVU AR is used to provide functions for binding smart wearable devices, such as matching Glasses, AR navigation, voice assistant, and translation. To use our products and services, please read and agree to our MYVU AR 《Service Agreement》 and the rules in our 《Privacy Policy》 for processing personal information. The Privacy Policy introduces how we will collect, use, store, and share your personal information and describes your basic rights. Regarding the important content of the above Privacy Policy, we would like to inform you of the following:\10\10 (1) The basic functions of MYVU AR are designed to provide services such as smart reminders, phone calls, viewing weather, and step count information for smart wearable devices, such as glasses. To do this, we require certain permissions, such as location permissions (for Android 11 and below), Bluetooth permissions, and notification permissions to facilitate device discovery and maintain the connection between devices. Additional permissions for phone calls and reading phone status, contacts, and phone numbers (for Android 14 and above) are also necessary to provide these basic functions.\10\10 (2) MYVU AR and the matching Glasses provide a variety of functions you may choose to enable, such as voice assistant, navigation, translation, and prompter. We will inform you of the purpose of the application when applying for the permissions involved in the functions. You can also disable the permissions in the permission management of MYVU AR at any time;\10\10 (3) We will use industry-leading security measures to protect your information security;\10\10 (4) You can view, modify, and delete personal information, withdraw consent, and cancel your account in MYVU AR.

This application requires an internet connection and access to read location information for device discovery, binding glasses devices and establishing transmission channels, determining navigation positions, voice navigation, voice weather queries, and automatically adjusting glasses brightness. During usage, it needs to access the user\'s phone number, contacts data, schedule data, call logs, application list, media data (photos, videos), and SMS data to provide services such as making calls, viewing phone notifications, displaying schedule information, uploading feedback images or videos, and prompting. The collection and use of the aforementioned personal information are triggered only when using specific business functions\10\10 Please read the 《Privacy Policy》 to learn more about how we handle your personal information, and read the 《Service Agreement》 to understand your rights and obligations. Click Agree to indicate that you agree to all of the above

Entering more voiceprint information can help the system better recognize your voice and improve recognition accuracy.

In order to provide voice recognition services for voice assistant, translation and other applications, you agree that the MYVU application obtains your voiceprint information to accurately identify your voice. Voiceprint information is only saved locally on the device and is strictly protected in accordance with legal regulations. For more information about the application\'s data processing rules, please consult the 《Privacy Policy》
